name: Space Hop (sk0g)
description:
Created by sk0g

Changes made:

  1. Added jump usage/ limit UI below the score view
  2. Picking up enough score now adds to the jump limit, required for completion of second level
  3. Added 2 custom levels
  4. The 2 levels have music varying in pitch, but lending a very different feel as a result
  5. The main menu space ship now spins slowly, bringing the page to life some more
